attributes.description:
Making some red enchiladas with my BOO LUPE ;D 
Likee ayeee ! But talking about it makes me hungry oh well at home i will tell my momma to make me some , well enjoy the recipe , okay ? OKAAAAY ! (: 
- FLackaBaby & LupeBoo <3
attributes.title: Red Enchiladas !
